title: My Thai green curry
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons rapeseed oil', '3 shallots, finely chopped', '3 cloves garlic, sliced', '1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh ginger', '1 1/2 tablespoons green curry paste, or to taste', '450g skinless chicken breast fillets - cut into strips', 'salt and pepper to taste', '5 stalks lemon grass', '1 (410g) tin baby sweetcorn, drained', '1/2 (227g) tin water chestnuts, drained', '300ml coconut milk', '1 bunch fresh Thai basil leaves, torn']
